sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"复杂的"之意。
means: complex ： 侧重内在关系的复杂，需通过仔细研究与了解才能掌握和运用。
complicated ： 与complex的含义接近，但语气更强，着重极其复杂，很难分析、分辨或解释。
sophisticated ： 侧重指事物发展到或达到高级的程度所体现出的复杂。
intricate ： 着重指错综复杂，令人迷惑理解。

sentence.Network_en: The family are rich, and extremely sophisticated and cosmopolitan.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家人很富有，老于世故，而且见多识广。

sentence.Network_en: Honeybees use one of the most sophisticated communication systems of any insect.
sentence.Network_cn: 蜜蜂之间所用的交流方式是昆虫中最为复杂的方式之一。

sentence.Network_en: Cocktails at the Plaza was a nightly ritual of their sophisticated world.
sentence.Network_cn: 到广场饭店喝鸡尾酒是他们这个高雅时髦的圈子中的人每晚必做的事情。

entry.tran: (机器、装置等)高级的，精密的;(方法)复杂的
entry.def: A sophisticated machine, device, or method is more advanced or complex than others.

example.ex: Honeybees use one of the most sophisticated communication systems of any insect.
example.tran: 蜜蜂之间所用的交流方式是昆虫中最为复杂的方式之一。

example.ex: ...a large and sophisticated new British telescope.
example.tran: 一架崭新的大型英式精密望远镜

entry.tran: 善于社交的;高雅时髦的;见过世面的
entry.def: Someone who is sophisticated is comfortable in social situations and knows about culture, fashion, and other matters that are considered socially important.

example.ex: Claude was a charming, sophisticated companion...
example.tran: 克劳德是一个很有魅力、见多识广的伙伴。

example.ex: Recently her tastes have become more sophisticated.
example.tran: 最近她的品位越发优雅时髦起来。

entry.tran: 精明老练的;老于世故的
entry.def: A sophisticated person is intelligent and knows a lot, so that they are able to understand complicated situations.

example.ex: These people are very sophisticated observers of the foreign policy scene.
example.tran: 这些人是观察外交政策领域动向的行家里手。

means.word_mean: 1. having or appealing to those having worldly knowledge and refinement and savoir faire;
2. ahead in development; complex or intricate;
3. marked by wide-ranging knowledge and appreciation of many parts of the world arising from urban life and wide travel;

sentences.sentence: "the sophisticated manners of a true cosmopolite"
"urbane and pliant...he was at ease even in the drawing rooms of Paris"

Sentence.sentence: LOL has evolved into something much subtler and sophisticated and is used even when nothing is remotely amusing.
The newer trend is to start recruiting poor and non-white students as early as the seventh grade, using innovative tools to identify kids with sophisticated verbal skills.

means.word_mean: 老练的; 老于世故的;见多识广的,见过世面的

sentences.en: Mr. Smith is a sophisticated world traveler.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生是一位老练的环球旅行家。

sentences.en: She has become very sophisticated since she went to live in London.
sentences.cn: 移居伦敦后她变得世故多了。

means.word_mean: 精密的, 尖端的,复杂巧妙的,先进的

sentences.en: This is a very sophisticated machine.
sentences.cn: 这是一台非常精密的机器。

jushi.english: Mr. Smith is a sophisticated world traveler.
jushi.chinese: 史密斯先生是一位老练的环球旅行家。

jushi.english: I can't work this sophisticated new equipment.
jushi.chinese: 我不能操作这种尖端的新设备。

jushi.english: This is a very sophisticated machine.
jushi.chinese: 这是一台非常精密的机器。
